sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { createPost, deletePost, getPosts, getPostsByCategory } from "../../action/PostAction"; import style from "../style/Homepage.module.css" import moment from 'moment' import { getCategories } from "../../action/CategoryAction"; import Pagination from "./Pagination/Pagination"; import jwt_decode from 'jwt-decode' const HomePage = () => { //all required paramets let posts, role, decode,urls const history = useHistory() let [category, setCategory] = useState('') let [title, setTitle] = useState('') let [content, setContent] = useState('') let [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1) let [postPerPage] = useState(5) const dispatch = useDispatch() //get info from global store const data = useSelector(state => state.Post) const auth = useSelector(store => store.Auth) const categorySelector = useSelector(store => store.Category) //take token const token = auth.token if (token != '') { decode = jwt_decode(token) role = decode.role } const indexOfLastPost = currentPage * postPerPage const indexOfFirstPost = indexOfLastPost - postPerPage //dispatch All information const pagination = (pageNumber) => {setCurrentPage(pageNumber)} useEffect(() => { dispatch(getPosts()) dispatch(getCategories()) },[dispatch]) let categorie = categorySelector.categories posts = data.allPost urls = data.photos if (urls === undefined) { urls === [] } if (posts === undefined) { posts = [] } if (categorie.length === 0) { categorie = [] } else { const currentPosts = posts.slice(indexOfFirstPost, indexOfLastPost) return ( <> {token === '' ? //if not sign in
{currentPosts.map((pst) =>
{history.push(`/register`)}}>{pst.login}
{history.push(`/register`)}}>

Title: {pst.title}

{pst.info}

{moment(pst.time).fromNow()}

)}
: //if sign in <> {role === 'admin' ? <>
dispatch({type:e.target.value, payload:posts})}>

Sort:







dispatch(getPostsByCategory(e.target.value))} >

Choose category:

{categorie.map( (category) =>
)}
{currentPosts.map((pst) =>
{history.push(`/user/${pst.user_id}`)}}>{pst.login}
{history.push(`/post/${pst.id}`)}}>

Title: {pst.title}

{pst.info}

{moment(pst.time).fromNow()}

)}
